item.title: Asset Catalogs With RubyMotion
item.description: Following on from my previous article Using Launch Screens with RubyMotion this article shows you another good reason to jump into Xcode for your RubyMotion project, this time to create Asset Catalogs.

item.title: Using Launch Screens with RubyMotion
item.description: Maintaining multiple launch screen images for different devices has always been a pain in iOS. Thankfully since iOS8 you can now use a custom view that can automatically adapt to different screen sizes.

item.title: Code Your Own Multi-User Private Git Server in 5 Minutes
item.description: Following on from last weeks post about Simple Two Factor SSH Authentication this post shows you how to use the same SSH trick to create a multi-user private git server. I believe the principles here can also be applied to mercurial or subversion.
